I am a software engineer.

About me

  • ex-Amazon
  • BSc Computer Science from King's College London
  • I was a participant in the first Estonian Youth Polar Expedition
  • I've completed the past 5 years of Advent of Code (GitHub)
  • I am an Associate of King's College
  • I was a participant in the Estonian science TV show Rakett69

If you want to reach me, email me at contact@laane.xyz (or any other email with the @laane.xyz domain)

Projects

Collection of things I've worked on over the years

  • laane.xyz

    Vanilla HTML/CSS/JS. Lighthouse score >90 in all categories. HTTP/3, wildcard email, DNSSEC.

  • playforia-minigolf

    Java. A retro online mini golf game. The original servers were shut down, so the source had to be decompiled from JVM bytecode and deobfuscated manually.

  • Baltic Stocks

    Java, React, TypeScript, MariaDB, Docker. Aggregates stock data from Baltic exchanges and displays them in one page.

  • DFA Algorithms

    TypeScript, React. Bachelor's project at King's College London. Implements and visualizes deterministic finite automata (DFA) equivalence testing and state minimization algorithms.

  • new-tab

    React, Sass. Minimalistic new-tab page with shortcuts and Wise account balance.

  • favicon-marquee

    JavaScript. A <20 kB class with no dependencies that adds an animated scrolling favicon to your website.

  • Others

    Check out my GitHub profile for other projects and open-source contributions.

This website is open-source
